name: healthbridge-ai
description: AI-powered community health navigator for rural India

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ai-engine && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run frontend" "npm run ai-engine"
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend

author: HealthBridge AI Team
